en.faq_subtitle: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our platform for barbershops and beauty salons.
en.faq_question1: Is uTime suitable for small barbershops or just for large businesses?
en.faq_answer1: uTime is designed to adapt to businesses of any size, from solo barbers to salons with multiple team members.
en.faq_question2: Do I need an internet connection to use uTime?
en.faq_answer2: Yes, uTime is a cloud-based platform, so it requires an internet connection to work properly and sync data in real time.
en.faq_question3: Does uTime help manage staff schedules and shifts?
en.faq_answer3: Absolutely! uTime is designed to make it easy to organize shifts, manage schedules, and track staff attendance.
en.faq_question4: Is there a free trial to try uTime?
en.faq_answer4: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial so you can explore all uTime features without any commitment.
en.faq_question5: Does uTime help me manage client appointments?
en.faq_answer5: Yes. uTime includes an intelligent booking system that allows your clients to book online and receive automatic reminders.

es.faq_question1: ¿uTime es adecuado para pequeñas barberías o solo para grandes negocios?

es.faq_question5: ¿uTime me ayuda a gestionar citas de clientes?
